## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                   | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |

| `src`    | `src`     | The avatar's source           | `string` | `undefined` |
| `width`  | `width`   | The avatar's width in pixels  | `number` | `undefined` |
